author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Repro steps:

> help new-NetworkControllerState

NAME
    Get-NetworkControllerState
SYNTAX
    Get-NetworkControllerState [-ConnectionUri <uri>] [-CertificateThumbprint <string>] [-Credential <pscredential>]
    [-PassInnerException]  [<CommonParameters>]

Mandatory parameter defined in NetworkControllerAdapter.cs ConnectionUri is shows as optional in ps.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: This issue was moved to MicrosoftDocs/windows-powershell-docs#55

title: Mandatory params defined in NetworkControllerAdapter not shown for get cmdlet
